## Extent.IsValid property

Determines whether this [`Extent`](../../extent) is valid.

```csharp
public bool IsValid { get; }
```

### Remarks

A valid extent has non negative [`Width`](../width) and [`Height`](../height). Also, all of its values are not `NaN` and finite.
